name: brel
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4
body: |- wi(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c2, c4)))

stmt.origin: sylib(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c2, c4)), wbr(c0, cxp(c3, c4), c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c2, c4)))
-| wi(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c0, cxp(c3, c4), c2))
-| wb(wbr(c0, cxp(c3, c4), c2), wa(wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c2, c4)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c2, c4)))
-| wi(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c0, cxp(c3, c4), c2))
-| wb(wbr(c0, cxp(c3, c4), c2), wa(wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c2, c4)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c0, cxp(c3, c4), c2))
-| wss(c1, cxp(c3, c4))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c2, c4)))
-| wb(wbr(c0, cxp(c3, c4), c2), wa(wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c2, c4)))
-| wss(c1, cxp(c3, c4))

body.origin: |- wb(wbr(c0, cxp(c3, c4), c2), wa(wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c2, c4)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c2, c4)))
-| wss(c1, cxp(c3, c4))

comment: Two things in a binary relation belong to the relation's domain. (Contributed by NM, 17-May-1996.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2015.)
